EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Minn Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for spending the day with us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for being a part of the Cloud-Native Roadshow in Minneapolis. We hope our event provided you with a clear perspective on the process and technology it takes to become a cloud-native organization.
We have made the presentation slides available for you:
- Cloud-Native Landscape <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-landscape]]> - Cloud-Native Roadshow Microservices <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-roadshow-microservices]]> - Google Cloud Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/google-cloud-platform]]> - Solace Messaging for Open Data Movement <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/solace-messaging-for-open-data-movement]]> - New Relic Resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/new-relic-resources]]>
If you are interested in having Pivotal present cloud-native content to your organization or want to learn more about Pivotal, contact us at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a follow up with our team.
Thank you again for joining us! The Pivotal Team
For more in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us again at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>, taking place December 4 - 7, 2017 in San Francisco. Use this code for $100 off conference passes: S1P_EVENT_CNR100 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>
